item.description:
Thursday, September 18 (MUST RSVP TO JOIN THIS EVENT!)
Where: Seattle's Best cafe inside Borders Bookstore, Downtown Crossing/State Street stop

Who should come?

Advanced speakers who have already mastered the basics and are looking to improve or maintain their speaking skills.

The Prerequisite Check

If you are a NON-NATIVE Japanese speaker who can converse in Japanese for 5 minutes without switching to English or another language.

If you are a NATIVE Japanese speaker who can converse in English for 5 minutes without switching to Japanese.


The Game

6:30- 6:40
Jiko Shoukai

6:40- 7:25
ADVANCED ENGLISH
Please use English only

7:25- 8:10
ADVANCED JAPANESE
Please use Japanese only

8:10 - 8:30
FLEXIBLE TIME
Free Conversation.
item.name: Thursday Coffee- for Advanced Speakers
